Class GitHubStatusNotifier

java.lang.Object
dd2480.ciserver.GitHubStatusNotifier
public class GitHubStatusNotifier extends Object
Sends commit status notifications to the GitHub Status API.

Uses the REST endpoint POST /repos/{owner}/{repo}/statuses/{sha} to set the commit status to pending, success, failure, or error.

Requires a GitHub personal access token with repo:status scope, provided via the GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable.

See Also:
  • GitHub Commit Statuses API

  • Method Details

    • notify

      public int notify(String repoFullName, CIResultObject result) throws IOException
      Sets the commit status on GitHub based on a CIResultObject.
      Parameters:
      repoFullName - the full repository name (e.g. "owner/repo").
      result - the CI result to report.
      Returns:
      the HTTP response code from the GitHub API.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the HTTP request fails.

    • notifyPending

      public int notifyPending(String repoFullName, String commitSHA) throws IOException
      Sends a "pending" status to GitHub before the build starts.
      Parameters:
      repoFullName - the full repository name.
      commitSHA - the commit SHA to set status on.
      Returns:
      the HTTP response code from the GitHub API.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the HTTP request fails.
